metadata.title: XPLife - Gamified To-Do List & ADHD Planner | Level Up Your Life
metadata.description: Transform boring goals into epic RPG quests. Earn XP. Track streaks. Become your best self with AI-powered life optimization. Perfect for ADHD & building habits.

hero.badge: Join 1,000+ players leveling up right now
hero.title: Level Up
hero.description: Transform boring goals into epic RPG quests. AI builds your daily missions. Earn XP. Level up for real.

questions.question: When you wake up, what energizes you most?
options: A thrilling new challenge or adventure
Learning something new or creative work
Connecting with loved ones or community

questions.question: How do you prefer to handle stress?
options: Talking it out with friends or family

questions.question: What type of goals excite you the most?
options: Bold, ambitious goals with big rewards

questions.question: How would your friends describe you?
What is your ideal way to recharge?
options: Deep focus on a passion project
Quality time with people I care about

dopamine.title: The Adventurer
dopamine.description: You thrive on excitement, novelty, and bold challenges. Your quests will focus on pushing boundaries and achieving ambitious goals.

acetylcholine.title: The Thinker
acetylcholine.description: You love learning, creativity, and deep focus. Your quests will center around skill mastery and intellectual growth.

gaba.title: The Guardian
gaba.description: You value stability, consistency, and inner peace. Your quests will build strong habits and promote balance.

serotonin.title: The Connector
serotonin.description: You draw energy from relationships and community. Your quests will strengthen bonds and promote meaningful connections.

welcome.title: Welcome to
welcome.description: You're about to embark on an epic quest to become your best self. Let's start by learning about you so we can craft the perfect challenges.

onboarding.title: Discover Your Player Type
onboarding.subtitle: Answer 5 quick questions to unlock your personalized quest system

questions.q: When facing a challenge, you prefer to:

classDescriptions.Adventurer: You thrive on exploration and new experiences. Your strength lies in adaptability and courage.
classDescriptions.Thinker: You excel at analysis and strategy. Your mind is your most powerful weapon.
classDescriptions.Guardian: You draw strength from protecting others. Discipline and dedication define your path.
classDescriptions.Connector: You empower those around you. Your charisma and empathy are your greatest gifts.

login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Log in to continue your quest

signup.subtitle: Begin your journey to leveling up
signup.checkEmailMessage: We sent a confirmation link to your email. Click it to activate your account and start your quest.

dashboard.subtitle: Here's your quest status for today

braverman.title: Unlock Deep Personality Insights

dailyTasks.placeholder: E.g. I want to exercise more, learn Spanish, read 20 pages daily...

class.adventurerDesc: You thrive on excitement, novelty, and bold challenges. Your quests focus on pushing boundaries and achieving ambitious goals.
class.thinkerDesc: You love learning, creativity, and deep focus. Your quests center around skill mastery and intellectual growth.
class.guardianDesc: You value stability, consistency, and inner peace. Your quests build strong habits and promote balance.
class.connectorDesc: You draw energy from relationships and community. Your quests strengthen bonds and promote meaningful connections.

levelUp.title: Level Up!
levelUp.description: Congratulations! You have reached a new level.

chat.title: AI Quest Advisor
chat.emptyState: Ask me anything about your quests and goals!
chat.errorSend: Failed to send message. Please try again.

generateQuestDialog.title: Generate {timeframe} Quests
generateQuestDialog.description: Create AI-powered {timeframe} quests tailored to your goals.
generateQuestDialog.emptyGoalsError: Please describe your goals before generating quests.
generateQuestDialog.placeholder: E.g. I want to exercise more, learn Spanish, read 20 pages daily...
generateQuestDialog.generateError: Failed to generate quests. Please try again.
generateQuestDialog.cascadeComplete: Created {yearly} yearly, {monthly} monthly, {weekly} weekly, {daily} daily quests!
generateQuestDialog.cascadeFailed: Cascade stopped. Generated quests so far have been saved.

features.subtitle: Power-Ups
features.title: Your Arsenal of
features.description: Everything you need to transform your daily routine into an adventure worth playing.

aiPowered.title: AI-Powered Tasks
aiPowered.description: Personalized daily quests based on your hormonal type and psychology. Every task is crafted to push you forward.

trackProgress.title: Track Your Progress
trackProgress.description: Earn XP, maintain streaks, climb the leaderboard. Watch your real-life stats grow as you complete quests.

deepPersonalization.title: Deep Personalization
deepPersonalization.description: Braverman test integration for tasks that match YOUR brain chemistry. No one-size-fits-all approach.

howItWorks.subtitle: Quest Guide
howItWorks.title: How It
howItWorks.description: From signup to level-up in three simple steps.

step1.title: Sign Up & Take Quick Quiz
step1.description: Answer a few questions about your lifestyle, goals, and brain type. It only takes 2 minutes.

step2.title: Get Daily AI Tasks
step2.description: Our AI crafts personalized quests every day based on your unique profile and progress.

step3.title: Complete & Level Up
step3.description: Finish quests to earn XP, unlock achievements, and climb the global leaderboard.

socialProof.badge: Join 1,000+ people leveling up their lives
socialProof.title: Player

testimonial1.name: Alex K.
testimonial1.quote: I've tried every productivity app out there. XPLife is the first one that actually made me stick to my habits. The RPG mechanics are genius.

testimonial2.name: Priya M.
testimonial2.quote: The AI tasks are scarily accurate. It's like having a life coach that actually understands how my brain works. Hit a 60-day streak!

testimonial3.name: Jordan T.
testimonial3.quote: Competing with friends on the leaderboard turned my lazy mornings into productive power hours. Up 3 levels this month alone.

finalCta.title: Ready to Start Your
finalCta.description: Every day you wait is XP you'll never earn. Start your free quest today.
finalCta.button: Start Your Quest â€” It's Free
finalCta.disclaimer: No credit card required. Free forever, upgrade anytime.

pricing.subtitle: Choose Your Path
pricing.title: Select Your
pricing.description: No credit card needed. Upgrade anytime.

upgradeBanner.unlockFeatures: Unlock unlimited AI tasks, 3 parallel goals, coaching & more.

blog.metaDescription: Tips, strategies, and insights on gamified productivity, habit building, and leveling up your real life.
blog.title: The
blog.subtitle: Tips, strategies, and insights on gamified productivity and leveling up your real life.
blog.emptyDescription: New quests are being written. Check back soon!
blog.ctaDescription: Stop reading about it. Start playing. Your quests are waiting.

footer.tagline: Level up your life, one quest at a time.

page.lockedDescription: The Braverman Nature Assessment unlocks at Level {level}. Complete daily quests to earn XP and level up!
page.title: Braverman Nature Assessment
page.subtitle: 140 questions to discover your neurotransmitter profile. Earn 500 XP on completion.

test.error: Please answer all {count} questions before submitting.
test.levelUp: Level Up! You are now Level {level}

results.deficiencyDescription: Higher scores indicate greater deficiency â€” your quests will target these areas.

questions: I feel tired or fatigued during the day.
I need caffeine to get going in the morning.
I have difficulty concentrating or focusing.
I feel sluggish or mentally slow.
I lack motivation to start or complete tasks.
I crave sugary or high-carb foods.
I have a low sex drive.
I feel indifferent or emotionally flat.
I have trouble waking up in the morning.
I tend to procrastinate on important tasks.
I have a hard time staying alert during meetings or lectures.
I feel bored easily.
I have difficulty making decisions.
I have low physical energy or endurance.
I feel like I am not living up to my potential.
I have poor hand-eye coordination.
I experience tremors or shaky hands.
I feel a need for constant stimulation or excitement.
I have gained weight without changing my diet.
I rely on energy drinks, supplements, or stimulants.
I have trouble finishing projects I start.
I struggle with addictive tendencies (food, screens, substances).
I feel detached from activities I used to enjoy.
I have difficulty with abstract thinking or problem solving.
I feel physically weak or lack muscle tone.
I have slow reflexes or reaction time.
I often feel dissatisfied with life.
I have difficulty following through on commitments.
I feel the need to take frequent naps.
I crave chocolate or sweets intensely.
I have been told I seem "checked out" or distant.
I feel lightheaded when I stand up quickly.
I have low blood pressure.
I prefer sedentary activities over physical ones.
I have difficulty handling multiple tasks at once.
I forget where I put things (keys, phone, wallet).
I have difficulty remembering names of people I meet.
I lose my train of thought mid-sentence.
I have trouble recalling recent conversations.
I find it hard to learn new information quickly.
I have difficulty reading and retaining what I read.
I struggle to visualize things in my mind.
I have poor sense of direction.
I cannot easily recall details of past events.
I have difficulty with verbal fluency or finding the right word.
I have trouble following complex instructions.
I feel my creativity has declined.
I have slow mental processing speed.
I struggle to maintain attention for long periods.
I have difficulty recognizing familiar faces.
I experience frequent "tip of the tongue" moments.
I have trouble doing mental arithmetic.
I make more spelling or writing errors than I used to.
I have difficulty understanding abstract concepts.
I feel my memory is worse than others my age.
I struggle to recall facts and figures.
I have trouble concentrating when reading.
I need to re-read paragraphs to understand them.
I feel less sharp mentally than I used to.
I have difficulty with spatial reasoning or puzzles.
I forget appointments or scheduled events.
I have decreased interest in learning new things.
I feel my vocabulary has shrunk.
I have difficulty following movie or book plots.
I struggle with tasks requiring visual imagination.
I have difficulty with hand-writing or typing speed.
I feel my comprehension has declined.
I have trouble multitasking effectively.
I have difficulty remembering lists or sequences.
I feel a general mental fogginess or haziness.
I feel anxious or nervous without a clear reason.
I experience heart palpitations or a racing heart.
I have tense or tight muscles.
I have difficulty relaxing even when I have free time.
I feel restless or on edge.
I have trouble falling asleep because my mind races.
I startle easily at sudden noises.
I feel overwhelmed by everyday tasks.
I worry excessively about things.
I experience shortness of breath during stressful moments.
I have digestive issues linked to stress (upset stomach, IBS).
I clench my jaw or grind my teeth.
I have difficulty sitting still.
I experience panic attacks or intense anxiety spikes.
I feel I cannot handle one more thing on my plate.
I have cold or sweaty hands.
I feel unsteady or unstable emotionally.
I experience headaches related to tension or stress.
I feel a sense of dread or impending doom.
I have difficulty being patient.
I get irritated or frustrated easily.
I rely on alcohol, food, or substances to calm down.
I have trouble with organization and staying tidy.
I feel nervous in social situations.
I experience back pain or body aches from tension.
I have night sweats or wake up feeling anxious.
I feel like my nervous system is always "on".
I have difficulty delegating tasks to others.
I feel guilty when I take time to relax.
I have ringing in my ears (tinnitus).
I have a trembling or quivering voice when stressed.
I feel on high alert in new environments.
I have difficulty saying "no" to people.
I experience frequent urination when anxious.
I feel my stress levels are higher than most people.
I feel sad or down for no apparent reason.
I have difficulty falling or staying asleep.
I crave carbohydrates, bread, or pasta.
I have low self-esteem or confidence.
I am easily irritated or have mood swings.
I feel hopeless about the future.
I have less interest in activities I once enjoyed.
I am overly sensitive to criticism.
I feel disconnected from others.
I have difficulty controlling my appetite.
I experience afternoon energy crashes.
I have obsessive or repetitive thoughts.
I feel tense or unable to unwind at the end of the day.
I have difficulty experiencing pleasure.
I am a perfectionist who gets upset when things are not right.
I have a negative inner voice or self-talk.
I find it hard to forgive myself or others.
I prefer to be alone rather than with others.
I have chronic pain or fibromyalgia symptoms.
I experience seasonal mood changes (worse in winter).
I have difficulty making decisions due to self-doubt.
I feel angry or resentful more than I should.
I have a tendency to overeat or binge eat.
I experience PMS, hormonal mood changes, or hot flashes.
I have difficulty with impulse control.
I feel emotionally numb or detached.
I have constipation or irregular digestion.
I wake up too early and cannot fall back asleep.
I am slower to recover from illness or injury.
I think about food or eating more than I should.
I have lost interest in intimacy or physical affection.
I have thoughts of self-harm or worthlessness.
I have difficulty maintaining routines or habits.
I experience unexplained crying spells.
I feel life lacks meaning or purpose.
